pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a library for GNU Guile to create language bindings via GObject Introspection. This is beta code. It is only partially documented. The API is stabilizing, but may still be subject to change. Guile GI has two primary components: - The gi scheme modules: guile modules that provide functionality to dynamically generate Scheme API from GObject typelib files. - libguile-gi.so or libguile-gi.dll: a compiled module that contains glue code to interface with GObject. To create bindings, use the use-typelibs syntax found in the (gi) library.
